title: Infocomm Technology | Singapore Institute of Technology
text_lines: The Gift that Keeps on Giving
Game On, One Code at a Time

SIT-DigiPen alumnus Nico Wong’s dream career as a programmer in the gaming industry took root after winning the confidence of his supervisor and team members during his Integrated Work Study Programme (IWSP).
Stuffed with Success: CIA Alumna Wins First-Ever World Stuffed Cabbage Championship
Beyond the Code: How a Student’s German Work Experience Led to Professional and Personal Growth
Infocomm Technology (ICT) is a powerful enabler for modern life and one of the most important drivers for technological innovation.

It is pervasive and increasingly essential to all that we do. It is transformative, revolutionising social interaction, health, business, governance, and security. It is also wildly innovative, encouraging novel ideas and new ways of working. All of these factors drive ever-shortening development times and sustain a rich and varied ecosystem that surrounds ICT.
We are a group of academics, administrators and researchers united by our desire to integrate learning, research and community in our quest to be leaders in education and research.
Our research predominantly allies with industry to tackle problems and create solutions that can transform businesses, healthcare and society at large.
Our pedagogy is geared towards inculcating skills useful for the industry of today and tomorrow, and is enriched by a high degree of application via extensive industry attachments.
Singapore Institute of Technology. All Rights Reserved.
